item.solidarytinker.trident.description:
It's similar to trident in vanilla
but it has higher damage and lower speed than vanilla one.
material.solidarytinker.bloodmeat.encycl: You feel like that it make an attempt to erode you as part of it
material.solidarytinker.damascus_steel.e: Even if the tools made of it haven't the lines like reality
material.solidarytinker.dwarf.encycloped: You make it in your Smeltery or Scorched Alloyer......But how did you do it?
material.solidarytinker.dwarf.flavor: Old age of star life cycle
material.solidarytinker.experience_steel: Its image was originating from a old friend called mizi,and it becomes this after servel versions
Full of the power of experience
material.solidarytinker.icefantasy.encyc:
Who icefantasy is?
 isn't he as a ???sensei?
material.solidarytinker.icefantasy.flavo: Who has ever gone to explore the depths of the frozen ocean to findwhat about concealing a thousand year old secret?
material.solidarytinker.magicuranium.enc: Have quite excellent radiation affinity,And it seems that can prevent the user from being affected of Debuffs
material.solidarytinker.saint_chief.ency: It is originating from a old friend who enjoy the series of Delight
material.solidarytinker.starfall: Â§6 st Â§d ar Â§b fall
material.solidarytinker.starfall.encyclo: uh...It is said that you can't see the aura when you're asleep
material.solidarytinker.takeru.encyclope: It said that the cat will have a wonderful response when you look at its eyes
You are nearly immune to unsourced damage(unsourced damage:Natural DamageSource(Out of world and more...)
[When the off-hand item belongs to the Heavy Shield of the tinkers Innovation]Complete immunity unsourced damage and Cancels the hit hit
modifier.solidarytinker.ancientocean.des:
As the wearer's health value higher than 80% max health value,attack ignore armor,magic resistance,protection,and Resistance,
And the tool has no durability loss under normal circumstances
modifier.solidarytinker.ancientocean.fla: Under the deep ocean.everything is mysterious and unpredictable
modifier.solidarytinker.anglefox.descrip:
[Damage from mobs]If  it is more than the user's max health
reduce it to 20% max health,the lowest damage is 4.if  it is more than the user's  50% max health,reduce it to 10% max health,the lowest damage is 2
modifier.solidarytinker.anglefox.flavor: You just look at it like this
modifier.solidarytinker.clean.descriptio: You are impervious to Debuffs now
modifier.solidarytinker.collapse.descrip: Burn the attacker forever,if it is burning,its damage to the wearer reduced to 20%
modifier.solidarytinker.collapse.flavor: The Eternal people called,It's just in the blink of an eye for long star life cycle
modifier.solidarytinker.corrode.flavor: Its effect seems like corrode liquid
modifier.solidarytinker.crcs.description: The user can use riptide sprint in any condition,even without water
modifier.solidarytinker.crushing.descrip: If the health value of object of attack lower than the user's max health,instant kill the object of attack(By remote attack isn't considered as the user kills it)
modifier.solidarytinker.darkstar.descrip: When the user died, permanently improve damage equal to 33% the user's max health value
modifier.solidarytinker.deepoceanblessin: As the user in water,give Water Breathing and attack recovers 10% lost health value when the user has absorption  value
Under the deep ocean,there is another sky.
modifier.solidarytinker.deepoceanecho.de: Base onï¿½ï¿½30% max health* 60% armor+ 1/10000 total experience valueï¿½ï¿½least value is 1ï¿½ï¿½ ï¿½ï¿½ to get ï¿½ï¿½Echo pointï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½transform  ï¿½ï¿½Echo pointï¿½ï¿½ * 0.5 * modifier level  into actual damageï¿½ï¿½Attack don't deal normal damage to players longer
modifier.solidarytinker.deepoceanprotect: Base onï¿½ï¿½30% max health* 60% armor+ 1/10000 total experience valueï¿½ï¿½least value is 1ï¿½ï¿½*modifier levelï¿½ï¿½ to get ï¿½ï¿½Echo pointï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½transform  ï¿½ï¿½Echo pointï¿½ï¿½ * 0.5 * modifier level  into damage reductionï¿½ï¿½its highest damage reduction is 90%,every 12 seconds be attacked give the wearer absorption value equal to 50% max health*modifier levelï¿½ï¿½the effect can be triggered repeatly until  absorption  value reachs one tenth of ï¿½ï¿½Echo pointï¿½ï¿½
Under the deep oceanï¿½ï¿½as if there is divine assistance
modifier.solidarytinker.elasticity.descr: In spite of it's softï¿½ï¿½it can bite mobsï¿½ï¿½deal damage equal to 50% orignal damage per modifier level
modifier.solidarytinker.elasticity.flavo: Punch on the cotton with one punch
modifier.solidarytinker.experiencekiller: Add 0.5 * modifier level  damage per experience levelï¿½ï¿½consumes 10 experience value every attack
modifier.solidarytinker.experienceprotec: Offer 0.1*modifier level  block value per experience level
modifier.solidarytinker.ignore.descripti: If the max health value of attacker lower than the user's max healthï¿½ï¿½ignore its damage
modifier.solidarytinker.inheart.descript: Loot random food when kill mobs-Even if them and killed mobs lack of connection
modifier.solidarytinker.neverend.descrip: When your own health drops below 30%, gain level 1 Red Temperatureï¿½ï¿½when you have this effectï¿½ï¿½Each level of Red Temperature attacks deals 15% of the target's maximum health damage
modifier.solidarytinker.neverend.flavor: Bro never angry and blushing, does he?
modifier.solidarytinker.reliable.descrip:
[Resident]Deals 2x additional damage to targets with >50% healthï¿½ï¿½In an ongoing battleï¿½ï¿½You will accumulate arrows on your bodyï¿½ï¿½Each time you take an injury, you accumulate arrowsï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½The more arrows, the higher the extra damage you dealï¿½ï¿½Each arrow provides 8% damage increaseï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Reaching 10 arrows and re-injuring will give you the Red Temperature effect.Each injury increases the red temperature by 5 secondsï¿½ï¿½Accumulating 20 arrows deals 145 times the damage at once,This attack will clears all arrows and grants a 2 Resistance Increase for 10 seconds
[When the mainhand or offhand holds the tinkers_ingenuity's Sea Dream Modifier]30% increased damage.Each attack has a 10% chance to instantly restore the cooldown of the whole bodyï¿½ï¿½The player's movement speed is locked to 130%,and gain damage absorption that stacksï¿½ï¿½Stacks up to 4 times max healthï¿½ï¿½
[When the mainhand or offhand holds not have the tinkers_ingenuity's Sea Dream Modifier]Greatly improved injury immunity.Handheld at night gains night vision and urgency
Possession of an ionized cannon with an item belonging to Etshtinker grants additional damage immunity
modifier.solidarytinker.removeradition.d: Lose 500 durability by right click a short time to clean environment radition
modifier.solidarytinker.riptide.descript: As in rain or in water,the user can use riptide sprint,improve modifier level can increase distance of sprint.But the user can throw normally without in rain or in water,don't like vanilla Riptide
modifier.solidarytinker.sandstrom.descri:
While on a mission in the desert, there is a 5% chance of finding raw gold per second and keeping it in your inventoryï¿½ï¿½Escape into stealth after being hit and when attack exits invisibility
Obtain the blessing of the sea of sand beyond the desert,Gain 30% Damage Immunity.Only triggers when there is source damage and the armor is not on cooldown
modifier.solidarytinker.seabless.descrip: Reduce 50% durability loss in water or in rain
modifier.solidarytinker.superblazing.des: Attack burns enemy foreverï¿½ï¿½if it in water,deal extra ï¿½ï¿½1.5+0.1*modifier levelï¿½ï¿½x   damage
modifier.solidarytinker.superblazing.fla: Although he is oldï¿½ï¿½he still need billions of years to extinguish
modifier.solidarytinker.swell.descriptio: As the user has 0-60 absorption value improve  absorption value* 0.5 *modifier levelï¿½ï¿½if absorption value higher than 60ï¿½ï¿½this modifier deals double damage than under 60
modifier.solidarytinker.swell.flavor: It is caused by long-time drug injection
modifier.solidarytinker.tacticsattack.de:
Gain an additional upgrade slot and ability slot equal to the level of the modifierï¿½ï¿½70% reduction in durability loss of your tools%
Ignores the target's invulnerableTime
modifier.solidarytinker.tacticsprotect.d:
Add an upgrade slotï¿½ï¿½ an ability slot and a defense slot per levelï¿½ï¿½Reduce 70% durability loss
 As the wearer's health reduced from beyond 20% to under 20%, gives the waerer  absorption  value equal to 30% max healthï¿½ï¿½ the effect's cooling time is 20 secondsï¿½ï¿½and gives 10 seconds ï¿½ï¿½Resistanceï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½its level=modifier levelï¿½ï¿½and the highest level is 4ï¿½ï¿½ and ï¿½ï¿½Red temperatureï¿½ï¿½(it improves a level when the effect is triggeredï¿½ï¿½the highest level is modifier level)ï¿½ï¿½and deal damage equal to absorption  value to all enemies within a range of 8*modifier levelï¿½ï¿½
modifier.solidarytinker.thefood.descript: You have ate so many foods bring you such improvementï¿½ï¿½each type of Thefood Eated deal 1.5ï¿½ï¿½modifier level  extra damage
modifier.solidarytinker.thefood.flavor: Whether out the hall or in the kitchen
modifier.solidarytinker.uncannyvalley.de: Offer ï¿½ï¿½Regenerationï¿½ï¿½ for other players within a range of 4*modifier levelï¿½ï¿½Give ï¿½ï¿½Witherï¿½ï¿½ for other mobs within the same range
modifier.solidarytinker.uncannyvalley.fl: It is called as Mobile Beacon
modifier.solidarytinker.voraciousfox.des: Deal extra random magic damageï¿½ï¿½it can be affected by lucky valueï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½higher level offer higher percentageï¿½ï¿½improve 10% the user's max health percentage per levelï¿½ï¿½
tooltip.bloodmeat_ingot.desc1:
Behind the bloody red
we don't know how many secrets are hidden......
tooltip.dwarf_ingot.desc1: As hot and dazzling as fixed stars
tooltip.takeru.desc1: takeru is a well behaved cat
